title: President expresses condolence over death of Sirajul Haq ’s mother
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 14 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Saturday expressed his condolence over the death of mother of Amir Jammat-e-Islami Senator Sirajul Haq.
In a tweet, the president prayed for the high ranks of the departed soul.
He also prayed for the bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude.
My condolences on the death of the mother of Sirajul Haq Sahib, Ameer Jamaat-e-Islami. May her soul rest in peace and may Allah give strength to the family to bear this loss.إِنَّا لِلّهِ وَإِنَّـا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعونَ
Our link to the departed remains in the good deeds we do.
— Dr. Arif Alvi (@ArifAlvi) November 14, 2020
